00011 cAnimatedTexture::cAnimatedTexture(const char* file, int new_num_frames, Uint32 new_frame_time) {
00012         
00013         init(); frames.clear();
00014         
00015         num_frames = new_num_frames;
00016         frame_time = new_frame_time;
00017         
00018         SDL_Surface* surface = IMG_Load(file);
00019         if (!surface) throw "loading file failed with IMG_Load()";
00020         
00021         unsigned subsurface_width = surface->w / num_frames;
00022         unsigned subsurface_height = surface->h;
00023         
00024         SDL_Surface* subsurface = NULL;
00025         
00026         // load up each image into a texture and store the texid.
00027         for (unsigned i=0; i<num_frames; i++) {
00028                 
00029                 subsurface = SubSurface(surface, i*subsurface_width, 0, subsurface_width, subsurface_height);
00030                 frames.push_back(load_texture_from_surface(subsurface));
00031                 SDL_FreeSurface(subsurface);
00032         }
00033         
00034         frame_start_time = SDL_GetTicks();
00035         
00036 }
00037 
00038 void cAnimatedTexture::init() {
00039 
00040         frame_start_time = SDL_GetTicks();
00041         num_frames = 1;
00042         current_frame = 0;
00043         frames.push_back(texid);
00044         frame_time = -1; // biggest unsigned value
00045 }
00046 
00047 cAnimatedTexture::~cAnimatedTexture() {
00048 }
00049 
00050 void cAnimatedTexture::bind() {
00051 
00052         // check if we need to switch to the next frame
00053         //cout << "tex " << SDL_GetTicks() << " " << frame_start_time << " " << frame_time << " " << bool(SDL_GetTicks() > frame_start_time + frame_time) << endl;
00054         if (SDL_GetTicks() > frame_start_time + frame_time ) {
00055                 //cout << "ping " << current_frame << " " << frames[current_frame] << " " << (glIsTexture(frames[current_frame])?"true":"false") << endl;
00056                 frame_start_time += frame_time;
00057                 current_frame++;
00058                 if (current_frame == num_frames) current_frame = 0;     
00059         } 
00060         
00061         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, frames[current_frame]);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void cAnimatedTexture::restart() {
00065 
00066         current_frame = 0;      
00067 }
